item.descripcion: Freelance translator, editor, proofreader; many clients; around 700 projects, 2.5 million words, a wide range of topics.

Thomas Mayer, Truth versus Precision in Economics (Edward Elgar, 1993).

Spanish edition: Economía, ¿verdad o precisión? (Marcial Pons, 2006). In collaboration.
Localization of statistical software (agency: CEOS Idiomas).
Software operating manual and other translation jobs (mostly IT).

Robin Paul Malloy, Law and Market Economy (Cambridge University Press, 2000).

Spanish edition: Derecho y economía de mercado (Marcial Pons, 2007). In collaboration.
Testing and deployment of CAT tools (Déj√†Vu X, Star Transit, Trados and SDLX) for Docuprint (Buenos Aires).
Enhancements to SIACNET, a system for online querying of library catalogs, for a library of the Argentinean Navy.
Reviewing and adaptation of the handbook of a Gateway notebook, from its Mexican translation to European Spanish (agency: Idea Factory Languages, Buenos Aires).
Translation of a website for Microsoft (agency: Docuprint, Buenos Aires).
Translation of case studies, white papers and marketing texts for Microsoft (agency: Docuprint, Buenos Aires).

Jae Shim, Joel Siegel, Financial Management (McGraw-Hill).

Spanish edition: Dirección financiera (McGraw-Hill, 2004). ISBN 8448142810.

John Hey, Intermediate Microeconomics (McGraw-Hill, 2003).

Spanish edition: Microeconomía intermedia (McGraw-Hill, 2004). ISBN 8448141822. In collaboration.
Localization of an e-commerce website for Idea Factory (Buenos Aires).
Programming of PHP scripts for the website of the Asociación Pozos de Caudé (Spain). (Note: I no longer maintain this site; their current website was created by someone else.)

William Stanley Jevons, The State in Relation to Labour (Transaction Publishers, 2002).

Spanish edition: El estado y los trabajadores (Marcial Pons, 2006). In collaboration.

Barry Field, Martha K. Field, Environmental Economics. An Introduction (McGraw-Hill, 2002).

Spanish edition: Economía ambiental (McGraw Hill, 2003). ISBN 8448139437. In collaboration.
Translation of a paper on European anti-discrimination policies (for the InterAmerican Development Bank).
Mohsin Khan, Current Issues In The Design And Conduct Of Monetary Policy, IMF Institute.
Translation from Spanish to English of a paper on econometric models of irrigation.

David Romer, Advanced Macroeconomics (McGraw-Hill, 2001).

Spanish edition: Macroeconomía avanzada (McGraw-Hill, 2002). ISBN 844813642X. In collaboration.
Translation of a paper on the evaluation of active labor-market programs (for the World Bank).
Reviewing of in-house training handbooks for Hitachi Data Systems (agency: Marcelo Trujillo, Buenos Aires).
Programming of SIACNET, a Java client-server application for online querying of library catalogs, for a library of the Argentinean Navy.

Translation and adaptation of:

Manuel Alberto Ricart, The Complete Idiot's Guide® to Linux, Second Edition (Que, 2000).

Spanish edition: Linux desmitificado (Prentice, 2001). ISBN 9879460049.

Sean Bonney et al., 3ds max® 4 Magic (New Riders, 2001).

Spanish edition: 3ds max® 4 Magic (Prentice, 2001). ISBN 9879460412.

Fernando G. Guerrero, Carlos Eduardo Rojas, Microsoft® SQL Server Programming by Example (Que, 2001).

Spanish edition: Programación en Microsoft® SQL Server 2000 (Prentice, 2001). ISBN 9879460634.

Robert Stanley, The Complete Idiot's Guide® to Adobe® Photoshop® 6 (Que, 2001).

Spanish edition: Adobe Photoshop 6 (Prentice, 2001). ISBN 9879460464.

David Karlins, The Complete Idiot's Guide® to Macromedia® Flash™ 5 (Que, 2001).

Spanish edition: Macromedia Flash 5 (Prentice, 2001).

Robert Plant, e-Commerce: Formulation of Strategy (Prentice Hall, 2000).

Spanish edition: eCommerce: Formulación de estrategia (Prentice, 2001). ISBN 9879460243.

Jill Dyché, e-Data: Turning Data into Information with Data Warehousing (Addison Wesley, 2000).

Spanish edition: e-Data: transformando datos en información con data warehousing (Prentice, 2001). ISBN 9879460146.

Joe Kraynak, The Complete Idiot's Guide® to Computer Basics (Que, 2000).

Spanish edition: Computación fácil (Prentice, 2000). ISBN 9879460057.

Bob Reselman, Active Server Pages 3.0 by Example (Que, 2000).

Spanish edition: Active Server Pages 3.0 con ejemplos (Prentice, 2000). ISBN 9879460111.

Paul McFedries, The Complete Idiot's Guide® to Microsoft® Windows® 2000 Professional (Que, 2000).

Spanish edition: Microsoft® Windows® 2000 Profesional (Prentice, 2000). ISBN 9879460014.
I taught a course on comprehensive reading for first-year students at the University of Bahía Blanca.
I taught introductory courses on Windows 98 and the Microsoft Office suite.
Undergraduate Teaching Assistant at UNS University, for an Introductory Course on the Philosophy of the Social Sciences, and for a course on Logic.

I worked as a programmer and system administrator at UNS University; experience with:

  • Access, FoxBase, dBase, Clipper, SQL
  • Excel, Lotus 123
  • Word
  • Visual Basic
  • C
